languages.text:
This value shows the Assassin's current base {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} before being modified by enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, bonuses, and penalties.
The Assassin's base lethality is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.
languages.original_text:
Этот показатель демонстрирует текущую базовую {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальность{/g} ассасина без учета {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристик{/g}, бонусов и штрафов противника.
Базовая летальность ассасина равна {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} — в зависимости от того, какое значение выше.

traits.locale_text:
This value shows the Assassin's current base {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} before being modified by enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, bonuses, and penalties.
The Assassin's base lethality is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

This value shows the Assassin's current base lethality before being modified by enemies' characteristics, bonuses, and penalties.
The Assassin's base lethality is equal to dodge or dodge penetration, depending on which of those is higher.

The Assassin's base lethality is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

The Assassin's base lethality is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text:
Этот показатель демонстрирует текущую базовую летальность ассасина без учета характеристик, бонусов и штрафов противника.
Базовая летальность ассасина равна уклонению или снижению уклонения – в зависимости от того, какое значение выше.

Этот показатель демонстрирует текущую базовую летальность ассасина без учета характеристик, бонусов и штрафов противника.
Базовая летальность ассасина равна уклонению или снижению уклонения – в зависимости от того, какое значение выше.

languages.text:
此数值代表刺客当前的基础{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}，之后会根据敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}、加值与减值进行调整。
刺客的基础致命等同于{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}两者较高值。
languages.original_text:
This value shows the Assassin's current base {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} before being modified by enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, bonuses, and penalties.
The Assassin's base lethality is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text:
此数值代表刺客当前的基础致命，之后会根据敌人的属性、{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}与减值进行调整。
刺客的基础致命等同于{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}或闪避穿透两者较高值。

languages.text:
Esta puntuación muestra la {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g} base actual del asesino, antes de aplicar bonificaciones, penalizaciones y modificadores por las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} de los enemigos.
La letalidad base del asesino es igual a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} o a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}, la que sea más alta.
languages.original_text:
This value shows the Assassin's current base {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} before being modified by enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, bonuses, and penalties.
The Assassin's base lethality is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text:
Esta puntuación muestra la letalidad base actual del asesino, antes de aplicar {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g}, penalizaciones y modificadores por las características de los enemigos.
La letalidad base del asesino es igual a su {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} o a su penetración de esquiva, la que sea más alta.

languages.text:
Dieser Wert zeigt die aktuelle Grund-{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Letalität{/g} des Assassinen an, bevor sie durch die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} der Feinde, Boni und Abzüge verändert wird.
Die Grund-Letalität des Assassinen entspricht dem Wert für {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweich-Reduktion{/g}; je nachdem, welcher höher ist.
languages.original_text:
This value shows the Assassin's current base {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} before being modified by enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, bonuses, and penalties.
The Assassin's base lethality is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text:
Dieser Wert zeigt die aktuelle Grund-Lethalität des Assassinen an, bevor sie durch die Eigenschaften der Gegner, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} und Mali verändert wird.
Die Grund-Lethalität des Assassinen entspricht dem Wert für {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} oder Ausweichdurchdringung; je nachdem, welcher höher ist.

languages.text:
Cette valeur représente la {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} de base de l'assassin avant qu'elle ne soit modifiée par les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}, bonus et pénalités des ennemis.
La létalité de base de l'assassin est égale à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou à la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}, selon la valeur la plus élevée.
languages.original_text:
This value shows the Assassin's current base {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} before being modified by enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, bonuses, and penalties.
The Assassin's base lethality is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text:
Cette valeur représente la létalité de base de l'Assassin avant qu'elle ne soit modifiée par les caractéristiques, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} et pénalités des ennemis.
La létalité de base de l'Assassin est égale à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} ou à la pénétration d'esquive, selon la valeur la plus élevée.

languages.text:
この値は、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}、ボーナス、ペナルティによって補正を受ける前の、アサシンの現在の基本{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}を示す。
アサシンの基本致死率は、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}のうち、高い方の値に等しい。
languages.original_text:
This value shows the Assassin's current base {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} before being modified by enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, bonuses, and penalties.
The Assassin's base lethality is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text:
この値は、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}、ボーナス、ペナルティによって補正を受ける前の、アサシンの現在の基本{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}を示す。
アサシンの基本致死率は、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}のうち、高い方の値に等しい。

languages.text:
Bu değer; Suikastçı'nın mevcut taban {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}öldürücülük{/g} parametresinin düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri,{/g} bonusları ve ceza puanlarınca değişikliğe uğramadan önceki hâlini gösterir.
Suikastçı'nın taban öldürücülüğü, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} (hangisi yüksekse) değerine eşittir.
languages.original_text:

The Assassin's base lethality is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.
